MORD BOGIE is a consultant, former lawyer, U.S. foreign aid official, and corporate executive with business experience on five continents. He graduated from Princeton in public and international affairs and, after service in the Marine Corps, from Harvard Law School. He lives with his wife, Sharon Nickles, a computer consultant, in
